tasks.dev: deno task writeKVData && deno task generateSlim && deno task eleventyWatch & deno run --watch --allow-net --allow-read --unstable-kv server/main.ts
tasks.generate: deno task clean && deno run --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-sys npm:@11ty/eleventy@^3.1.2
tasks.prod: deno task writeKVData && deno task generate && deno task generateSlim
